o.. sorry 'bout that guys, i forgot to tell you, i fixed the problem. it 
wasn't the file. it was my Glad, i had to re-install it. but now for some 
reason, it messes up. to fix it all i have to to is hit Esc, and then say 
no, and it fixes everything right up.


----Original Message Follows----
If the converter messes something up let me know and I'll try to find out
the cause.

The process is straightforward so in theory it shouldn't ever mess up a
legitimate file :)

- Deathifier

----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>
To: <gladiator@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 2:16 AM
Subject: [gladiator] Re: legitimate teams

 > That's wierd.  I'll run an anti-virus program just to check that
 > possibility.  I have gotten a certain virus sent to me in email
 > repeatedly by different people, but I never opened the attachement.
 > I'm also going to make sure I can renumber the scenario because I used
